title: H, my Pixel 3a power button and screen stopped working.how do i fix this?
content:
Hi, 
my pixel 3a fell and the power and touch screen stopped responding.
at first the screen was on and with the finger print reader in the back it would turn on, the volume rocker worked as well. 
had to connect a corded mouse with a usb to try and restart the device.
once the screen turned off in the restart, it would not turn on again. 
I can feel the haptic feedback when i touch the finger print reader or connect a charger.
 nothing else works, the screen is black and there is no sound. tried to call the number or use find my device but nothing.
when connected to a computer with a USB cable, i can see the device in the "other devices" list. if i long press the power button, i can see it is gone. a few seconds after i stop pressing it, the device will reappear in the list. 
should I try and look at the screen connections? what about the power button? 
thanks in advance
Roey
